data.title: Troublemaker Lyrics
data.meta_description: Troublemaker Lyrics by Deepcentral. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
I was roaming with no home Need you near to calm the power of the storm Like a bark without a shore I just cannot be without you anymore This is clearer, in the mirror, when you′re so close to me I can feel it just the way it's meant to be Always something, keeps me coming, coming back to your heart But you are just a troublemaker for my sun... Lala lala lala la I′m nothing but a stranger Lala lala lala la Am I running into danger?! You came to me now Lala lala la laaaai Lala lala lala la I'm nothing but a stranger Lala lala lala la Am I running into danger?! You came to me now Lala lala la laaaai Writer(s): Doru Todorut, George Calin
Lyrics powered by www.musixmatch.com
